section.title: Description
section.p: Describes the nature of the financial arrangement or contract between a healthcare provider and a health plan. Financial Arrangements are commonly based on Fee Schedules, Capitation arrangements, or some kind of combination of the two.

stentry.p: Identifies the legal agreement between a Health Plan and a (group of) provider(s) in which the method and value of payments are defined.
The time period for which the Financial Arrangement is valid.
Pointer to the healthcare-financing-related product offering which utilizes the Financial Arrangement for payment determination.
